Html:
I get an error when executing the line:

 

IAuthenticationRequest

 

request = OpenIdRelyingParty.CreateRequest(identifier, realm); (MembershipController.cs Ln109)

 


Error:

return_to 'http://localhost:52053/OpenId' not under realm 'http://localhost:52053/Kigg/OpenId'.

Any thoughts on why this is happening would be appreciated.

Thanks,
aztrip7s

I think most of the openid provider requires the OpenID redirect url under the realm, this seems a standard and since the provider requires to check back the url which is not possible with a local host url. I think you can get more detail on this in the DotNetOpenID library group which is used for the OpenID support.
